name: Computer Graphics
description: Through my time at OSU I have taken many differnt classes focusing on Computer Graphics that taught me OpenGL and GLSL. These classes include, Geometric Model, Intro to Computer Graphics, and Computer Graphics Shaders. My capstone Project also had me using a lot of OpenGL.

name: 3D Modeling and Animation
description: I have experience in Blender through my Capstone Project, as well as some of the classes I've taken, such as Computer Animation. I enjoy using the the shader graph editor to crate photorealistic extraterrestrial objects, such as the planet used as the background here.

name: Programming Languages
description: I have experience in C, C++, Rust, and Python from the many classes I have taken and in both C# and Lua from my video game modding experience.

name: Web and Mobile App Development
description: I have experience in HTML, CSS, Vue.js, React.js, and SQL from classes I've taken as well as my time at The Sustainability Office. This website was also hand built using react :D

name: Soft Skills
description: I have many different soft skills that help me be successfull. This includes, Problem Solver, Adaptive Learner, Teamwork Oriented, Meticulous, Friendly, Leadership, and many more.

name: Project Development
description: During my time at OSU I developed many different projects. Each of these projects went through many phases including design, implementation, testing, debugging, and publishing. Durring my time at OSU I developed many different projects. Each of these projects went through many phases including design, implementation, testing, debugging, and publishing. I frequently used an Agile format to develop these projects as I found it to be the best way to keep a project alive throughout development.

name: Video Game Development
description: I have gone through many stages of developing video games, including design, implementation, testing and publishing. I have spent time monitoring bugs, logging, as well as patch implementation, and development using The Unreal Engine blueprint system in Unreal Engine 4.7 and 5 and through my custom game engine, Project Space.

name: Leadership
description: At the start of the Covid-19 Pandemic a lot of my fellow Computer Science students were lost and felt alone. I created a CS community, with the help of a few colleagues, that allowed for over 1,500 students to feel welcome and receive help with coursework. I lead a team of moderators that ensured every student felt safe and welcomed into this community of peers.
